profile.name: DEMID VETOSHKIN
profile.info: With dozens of web development projects under my belt — from Telegram Mini Apps to complex admin dashboards and sales funnels for info-business — I bring meticulous attention to detail as a frontend developer. Every aspect matters to me, from system architecture design and requirements analysis to component implementation and performance optimization.

projects.title: Vuscan.net
projects.description: Online scanning of Internet resources for vulnerabilities, SQL injections, CMS and security errors. The application has integrated a system for parsing open and closed systems, as well as the CtyproCloud payment system.

projects.title: Bank.ir
projects.description: The client of the banking application on React Native. The program provides authorization by phone number and the possibility of transfer to other banking systems.
